name: GooseBumps (itch)
description:
THIS IS ONLY A DEMO. THE HORROR DEMO.

Year 2048: The experiments continue for creating the perfect soldier.

Today the guinea-pig is a GOOSE.

IT WORKS.

But the animal cannot controll his super powers....

A dimensional door has been open...

The goose is run away!

Year 2014: "I can read, I can write...I Can think! I am a goose, with super-powers, in the past, in another dimension.

What else will happen to me?"

A incredibile SURVIVAL/HORROR game with a GOOSE!

Are you ready to get GOOSEBUMPS?

Main features:

-A goose

-A goose with a shotgun

-Simple crafting system

-An immersive storyline

-Various and huge environments

-Super powers

Coming Soon:

-Advance crafting system

-Dress up your goose with variety of clothes

-and more...
